Thanks for joining!

Your ARMCHAIR DETECTIVES BUREAU test is on its way. Check your email in a few minutes, then just read the story and consider the clues before submitting your answer!

Look for an email with the subject line:

[ARMCHAIR DETECTIVES TEST] Can you prove Herman Matthews killed his young wife?

New short stories are posted on the site every other day on a rotating 2-week schedule so you'll get an email from me whenever that story posts.

And every Sunday morning, usually about 9 a.m. your local time, you'll get the weekly CaseFiles digest email with a list of new stories, weekly store discount and all the other goodies I promised.

And if you haven't already oriented yourself to what I have to offer here at TalesofMurder.com, be sure to check out the START HERE in the top menu, above, to learn what the site is all about …
